title: Revert "Avoid package dependencies on inbox libraries"
body: Reverts dotnet/msbuild#8669 because it causes component governance alerts like (internal Microsoft link) https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_componentGovernance/DotNet-msbuild-Trusted/alert/3582291?typeId=6797870&pipelinesTrackingFilter=0

commit.message:
Revert "Avoid package dependencies on inbox libraries (#8669)"

This reverts commit 8326396cb46aff95a385316674ce076ddd0941d6.

nodes.body: fyi @ViktorHofer; we can try again but I need to unblock builds.
